body_html:
Yep, same error as before. This is why I have all those ops in BUILD_OPTS:

Cloning into 'tensorflow'...

body:
Yep, same error as before. This is why I have all those ops in `BUILD_OPTS`:

```

C:\Windows\system32>cd C:\Users\adam.hendry\Downloads

C:\Users\adam.hendry\Downloads>git clone https://github.com/tensorflow/tensorflo
w
Cloning into 'tensorflow'...
remote: Counting objects: 281937, done.

^Cceiving objects:   4% (12988/281937), 3.68 MiB | 84.00 KiB/s

Cloning into 'tensorflow'...
remote: Counting objects: 281937, done.

Receiving objects: 100% (281937/281937), 138.32 MiB | 208.00 KiB/s, done.
Resolving deltas: 100% (220971/220971), done.
Checking out files: 100% (9606/9606), done.

C:\Users\adam.hendry\Downloads>cd .\tensorflow\tensorflow

C:\Users\adam.hendry\Downloads\tensorflow\tensorflow>git checkout r1.5
Switched to a new branch 'r1.5'
Branch r1.5 set up to track remote branch r1.5 from origin.

C:\Users\adam.hendry\Downloads\tensorflow\tensorflow>cd ..

C:\Users\adam.hendry\Downloads\tensorflow>python configure.py
Extracting Bazel installation...
You have bazel 0.9.0 installed.
Do you wish to build TensorFlow with XLA JIT support? [y/N]: y
XLA JIT support will be enabled for TensorFlow.

ronment variable "TF_MKL_ROOT" every time before build.

 n
```
